definitions.text: a loud low dull continuous noise
examples: they heard the rumbling of thunder

definitions.text: a complaint uttered in a low and indistinct tone
show one's unhappiness or critical attitude
examples: He scolded about anything that he thought was wrong
We grumbled about the increased work load

definitions.text: make complaining remarks or noises under one's breath
examples: she grumbles when she feels overworked

definitions.text: to utter or emit low dull rumbling sounds
